messages.message: Hey Germany, would you like to work together?
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'Hey Germany, would you like to work together?'.

messages.message:
Currently, France and I are keeping the channel clear and, for 1901 only, we aren’t building fleets in Brest or Liverpool.

I’ve asked Russia not to go north and am trying to convince Italy to not hit France.

My preference is to work with you over France long-term because you can build armies while I build fleets, ensuring neither of us can effectively stab the other
messages.input:
My response to GERMANY:'Currently, France and I are keeping the channel clear and, for 1901 only, we aren’t building fleets in Brest or Liverpool.

I’ve asked Russia not to go north and am trying to convince Italy to not hit France.

My preference is to work with you over France long-term because you can build armies while I build fleets, ensuring neither of us can effectively stab the other'.

messages.message: To work with you, I’d ask that you don’t build F Kie in 1901 and that you let me have Belgium at some point before 1904
messages.input: My response to GERMANY:'To work with you, I’d ask that you don’t build F Kie in 1901 and that you let me have Belgium at some point before 1904'.

messages.message: I’m good with that plan. Similarly I’d rather ally with you over France but will be needing to discuss nonaggression for the moment with France.

messages.message:
If I can take it in 1901, I’d prefer that so that I can put out a navy that can break into MAO without losing EC.

We each get 5 if we split
Germany: Den, Hol, Swe, Par, Mar
England: Nrwy, Bel, Bre, SP, Por

This split also puts my navy away from you and pushes you towards armies, which is more sustainable long-term.

I said before 1904 because it is possible that France will order A Par - Pic & A Mar - Bur, or some other combination of moves that makes it near impossible for us to take Bel in 1901.
messages.input:
My response to GERMANY:'If I can take it in 1901, I’d prefer that so that I can put out a navy that can break into MAO without losing EC.

This split also puts my navy away from you and pushes you towards armies, which is more sustainable long-term.

I said before 1904 because it is possible that France will order A Par - Pic & A Mar - Bur, or some other combination of moves that makes it near impossible for us to take Bel in 1901.'.

messages.message:
